header.title: parse_transform

description.p: The following section describes the callback functions that the compiler uses to apply a parse transformation to parsed code.

fsdescription.title: Callback Functions
fsdescription.p: The following functions are to be exported from a parse_transform callback module in order to define the callback interface for a parse transformation.

desc.p: Defines the parse transformation function to be applied to the parsed code.
